subtitle: This is a special dessert that looks stunning when finished.

method.text: Use 3 paper cake cases together for extra strength. Brush the inside of each set of paper cake cases with melted chocolate. Leave in a cool place to set.
Brush insides with a second layer of melted chocolate. Leave once again until set.
Brush ridged sides of flower leaves with melted chocolate. Leave until set. (The chocolate leaves can then be peeled off the real ones.}
Mix plum puree with lightly whipped double cream and Cassis. Add sugar to taste.
Dissolve gelatine in the measured water. Add to plum mixture. Keep on one side until mixture starts to thicken.
Fill each chocolate case with the par-set mousse mixture. Make sure the top surface is level. Chill until set.
Carefully peel off paper cases. Join chocolate cup mousses together in pairs, using a little extra melted chocolate. Chill briefly once again until set.
Arrange on their sides, on small serving plates, and decorate with chocolate leaves.

title: Chocolate cup plum mousses
